actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1554.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #759 (362-9).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 3375 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to make certain changes in the places of holding Federal district courts in the divisions within judicial districts, and in judicial district dividing lines.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1554) Federal District Court Organization Act - Makes specified changes in the places of holding Federal District courts, in the divisions within judicial districts, and in judicial district diving lines.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to make certain changes in the places of holding Federal district courts in the divisions within judicial districts, and in judicial district dividing lines.
